replies.author: JorisBodin

replies.bodyText: gridViewEnabled sounds good, hasGridView or isGridView is rather bad regarding naming conventions for accessor methods e.g. getHasGridView or isHasGridView? ;)
replies.author: AndyScherzinger

replies.bodyText: field should be gridViewEnabled and getter: isGridViewEnabled().
replies.author: tobiasKaminsky

timeline.author: AndyScherzinger

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                                                   Account account, List<ThumbnailGenerationTask> asyncTasks, Boolean isGridView)
          
          
            
                                                   Account account, List<ThumbnailGenerationTask> asyncTasks, Boolean gridView)
timeline.author: AndyScherzinger
AndyScherzinger

timeline.bodyText: is the size also in the then called API a pixel or a DP value? If it is a Pixel value then the magic number "8" used some lines below might be read as Pixel, so to be sure it is pixel-perfect it would have to be read from a dimsvalue why Android would convert to the correct pixel value at runtime.
timeline.author: AndyScherzinger

replies.bodyText: I replaced it with dynamically calculated values for each scale. Watch the next commit
replies.author: sirambd

timeline.bodyText: This is what I meant in the dims comment above
timeline.author: AndyScherzinger
